title: R·TYPE a new typography website
content:
Hello everyone,

I made a small website with my type work called R•TYPE.  
Check it out at [www.r-typography.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204300/http:/www.r-typography.com/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015204300im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rType_5321.jpg)
author: rui abreu

comments.content:
It looks great. I think it is nice that the left navigation stays put when you scroll down, although the pages weren't long.  
The Foral video is sweet. Is that all CG background?
Thanks. Yes it is all 3D, with photographed textures.

That’s a **very** impressive layout; I’ll have to spend some more time looking at the rest of Ms. Vaz’s work. Think about adding PDF versions of your specimens—having a printout makes it much easier to get a boss or client to pay for a font.
